Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say this game has just a few glitches.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.

DMT (Biggoron).text: I bet you'd like to have more bombs.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: BRRING BRRING This is Ulrira. Wrong number?

GC (Maze).text: The single rupee is a unique item.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the Development branch may be unstable.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the stick is mightier than the sword.

HC (Rock Wall).text: I heard @ isn't very good at Zelda.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that crouch stabs mimic the effects of your last attack.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Medigoron sells the earliest Breath of the Wild demo.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Barinade fears Deku Nuts.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that all the Zora drowned in Wind Waker.

KF (Outside Storms).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that arbitrary code execution leads to the credits sequence.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: Open your eyes.^Open your eyes.^Wake up, @.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: You found a spiritual Stone! By which I mean, I worship Nayru.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that monarchy is a terrible system of governance.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that Bongo Bongo really hates the cold.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: May the way of the Hero lead to the Triforce.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that Zelda is a poor leader.

ToT (Left).text: I'll make you eat those words.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Save your future, end the Happy Mask Salesman.

ToT (Right).text: They say that Flare Dancers do not fear Goron-crafted blades.

ToT (Right-Center).text: Dear @, please come to the castle. I've baked a cake for you.&Yours truly, princess Zelda.

ZD (Mweep).text: 'Member when Ganon was a blue pig?^I 'member.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that walking backwards is very fast.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say Ganon's tail is vulnerable to nuts, arrows, swords, explosives, hammers...^...sticks, seeds, boomerangs...^...rods, shovels, iron balls, angry bees...

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that looking into darkness may find darkness looking back into you.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: Without the Lens of Truth, the Treasure Chest Mini-Game is a 1 out of 32 chance.^Good luck!

ZR (Open Grotto).text: Gorons are stupid. They eat rocks.
